root.NumberedHeadingIndented: Management culture of the Post Office

MotionTextIndented.from_cdata: That this House has considered the management culture of the Post Office.

from_cdata.p: The subjects for these debates were determined by the Backbench Business Committee.
Oral evidence taken before the Business and Trade Committee on 16 January 2024, on Post Office and Horizon – Compensation: follow up, HC 477
Oral evidence taken before the Business and Trade Committee on 20 June 2023, on The Post Office, Session 2022-23, HC 1501

root.DebateTimingRubric: Until 5.30pm or for half an hour (whichever is later) (Standing Order No. 9(7))
root.MotionText: Post Office services in isolated communities: Andrew Western
root.DebateTimingRubric: The sitting will last for up to three hours (Standing Order No. 10(1)).
root.MotionText: That this House has considered humanitarian aid and children in Gaza.: Apsana Begum

from_cdata.p: The subject for this debate was determined by the Backbench Business Committee. The sitting will be suspended and time added if divisions take place in the main Chamber (Standing Order No. 10(3)).
Oral evidence taken before the International Development Committee on 14 November 2023 and 9 January 2024, on the Humanitarian situation in Gaza, HC 110
Correspondence from the International Development Committee to the Foreign Secretary, on the Humanitarian situation in Gaza, reported to the House on 17 January 2024
Correspondence between the International Development Committee and the Foreign Secretary, on the Humanitarian situation in Gaza, reported to the House on 16 November and 5 December 2023
e-petition 649371, Allow Palestinian Children to Enter the UK During Ongoing Conflict
